fields.label: Product Shortcode
fields.message:
To display a selection of products in a list. Use the any combination of the following options [shcms_featured_product

ids="product id/s comma separated" category="comma separated list of category slugs" featured="yes or no" per_page="the amount of products you want to display" orderby="date" order="desc or asc" grid= 'false' or 'true' ] Examples: Display products with IDs by data order: [shcms_featured_product ids="18408,18405,18259" orderby="date" order="desc"] Display all featured products: [shcms_featured_product featured="yes" orderby="date" order="desc" ] Display 4 products from the ds3 (slug) catagory: [shcms_featured_product category="ds3" per_page="4"] Display 9 products from the c1 and c3 catagory: [shcms_featured_product category="c1,c3" per_page="9"] If you want to display list in a grid add grid="true" Display all featured products: [shcms_featured_product featured="yes" orderby="date" order="desc" grid="true" ]

fields.label: Offer Shortcode
fields.message:
To display a selection of offers in a 3 across grid. Use the any combination of the following options [shcms_featured_offers

ids="offer id/s comma separated" offer_cat="offer_category slug" offer_type="offer_type slug" model="comma separated list of model slugs" per_page="the amount of products you want to display"

] Examples: Display 3 offers from ex-demo (slug) type: [shcms_featured_offers offer_type="ex-demonstator" per_page="3" ] Display offers with IDs: [shcms_featured_offers ids="13511,13517,13507" ] Display 3 offers from the motability-offers (slug) catagory: [shcms_featured_offers offer_cat="motability-offers" per_page="3" ] Display 6 offers which are ds3 (slug) model: [shcms_featured_offers model="ds3" per_page="6" ] Display 3 offers combined: [shcms_featured_offers model="ds3" offer_cat="business-offers" offer_type="business-contract-hire" per_page="3" ]

fields.label: Testimonial Shortcode
fields.message:
To display a selection of testimonials in a carosel. Use the any combination of the following options [shcms_testimonials_slider

testimonial_ids="testimonial id/s comma separated" featured=true or false model_slug="model slug" amount="the amount of testimonials you want to display"

] Examples: Display 4 featured that have a link to model c1 (slug): [shcms_testimonials_slider amount="4" featured=true model_slug='c1'] Display 6 testimonials with linked model c1 (slug): [shcms_testimonials_slider amount="6" model_slug="c1" ] Display 4 featured testimonials: [shcms_testimonials_slider amount="4" featured=true] Display testimonials with IDs: [shcms_testimonials_slider amount="4" testimonial_ids="8192,11963" ]
